metadata.name: Not a Drone Shot #1
metadata.description:
Photo was taken handheld without safety procedures capturing a local street market in Kowloon, Hong Kong, pre-covid. 

The urban freneticism and hyperactivity that I like to represent are expressed by a condensation of shooting angles, which draw the spectator's eye. Once again I move away from the traditional representation that we have of the landscapes around us in order to present a highly poetic vision.

Bringing a new definition to urban landscape photography, and exploring unlimited possibilities in photography without a drone.

â€” I love how this photo shows and reminds me how tiny we are, in the universe.

*This piece comes with an exclusive signed x-large physical art print*
